abstract: Bank of America has completed its $3.3 billion acquisition of U.S. Trust from Charles Schwab and on Monday made several appointments to its newly-created Private Wealth Management organization, which has nearly $265 billion in assets under management and more than $427 billion in total client assets.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has completed its $3.3 billion acquisition of U.S. Trust from Charles Schwab and on Monday made several appointments to its newly-created Private Wealth Management organization, which has nearly $265 billion in assets under management and more than $427 billion in total client assets.

headline.main: BofA Completes $3.3 Billion Deal for U.S. Trust
